Attacks.Name: Rock Slide
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Crunch
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Bleed special condition.

Attacks.Name: Stone Edge
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is Stun.

Attacks.Name: Earthquake
Attacks.Effect: This attack targets all characters, friend or foe, within its range.

Superpowers.Name: Sand Stream
Superpowers.Effect: Create a sandstorm in a range of 3 around Tyranitar until its next activation. All characters within the sandstorm, except Tyranitar, lose 1 power at the start of their activation.

Superpowers.Name: Unyielding
Superpowers.Effect: When Tyranitar would be dazed or KO'd by an attack, it can use 3 power to reduce the damage to 1, preventing the daze or KO.

Attacks.Name: Hyper Beam
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Tyranitar gains the Stun special condition.
